response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its intrinsic worth to you stands at $1,000,000. However, considering its market position and the investment we've made into its development, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a price of $950,000. This represents a strategic opportunity for both parties, allowing us to recoup a portion of our costs while providing you with a substantial discount on what you perceive as its value. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product to the forefront of your business endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
